data.title: Farha (2021)

data.title: Midnight Runners (2017)

data.title: Tropical Malady (2004)

data.title: Tokyo Sonata (2008)

data.title: Full Time (2021)

data.title: Holy Spider (2022)

data.title: Missing (2023)

data.shortSummary: Truth-seeking and revenge fuel this Korean classic

headline: Popular + Intense
subtitle: Find the best intense movies to watch, from our mood category. Like everything on agoodmovietowatch, these intense movies are highly-rated by both viewers and critics.
